MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the ML11 postcode area of Forth. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 4:19pm. Our engineers are on their way to the Ravenswood Road substation and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:10pm on Monday, 4th January 2021
